text: Ruth Roberta de Souza was a basketball player from Brazil. Ruth competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics. She was born on 3 October 1968 and died on 13 April 2021.Ruth == References == Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Brazilian basketball players Category:People from Mato Grosso do Sul
title: Ruth Roberta de Souza
